blocks.headline: Harness the Power of Git with TinaCMS.
blocks.text: Unleash superior content management by merging the capabilities of Git with the intuitiveness of TinaCMS.

blocks.content:
## TinaCMS: A Git-backed CMS for the modern web

TinaCMS provides a user-friendly interface that sits atop your Git repository, providing you with robust version control for your website content. Your editors won't need to know what Git is.

items.headline: Robust Version Control
items.text: Leverage Git's unrivalled version control capabilities to manage your website content more effectively.

items.headline: Editor-friendly Interface
items.text: Provide a simple, user-friendly content editing interface for your editors. No need to know Git.

items.headline: Git-backed Storage
items.text: With TinaCMS, all your content is stored directly in your Git repository, ensuring consistency and reliability.

items.headline: Open Source Frontend
items.text: TinaCMS's frontend codebase is open-source, backed by a vibrant community and regular updates.

items.headline: Ideal for Any Project
items.text: Whether you're managing an open-source or closed-source project, TinaCMS with Git support is an ideal choice.

items.headline: Streamlined Workflow
items.text: Improve collaboration and streamline your content production workflow with TinaCMS's Git integration.

blocks.headline: Ready to take your content management to the next level?
blocks.text: Get started with TinaCMS and Git now.

seo.title: Power of Git with TinaCMS
seo.description: Experience superior content management with the power of Git and the intuitiveness of TinaCMS. Ideal for both open-source and closed-source projects.
